instructions: Character sheet for Stars Without Number, Revised Edition

useroptions.description: Add a homebrew Luck Save for those times where only pure luck can pull the character through.
Chose whether to change to the skill list from First Edition SWN, or use neither (In that case you should probably enable custom skills).
Adds an extendable extra skill list for custom skills.
Useful for counting things like Plot Points, Inspiration, Light side/Dark side points etc. Max 4 counters.
Run a space opera campaign with Heroic characters. Rules for this are in the Deluxe edition.
Show a saction where you can put Space Magic, a Deluxe edition system for importing fantasy magic into SWN.
Removes the Psionics sections completely if you're playing without psionics.
Chose what to show in the "next level xp" field, if anything.
